trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_SEQ_00<tab>Sisipu of the Fishermen's Guild wants to order a new fishing boat.

TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_SEQ_01<tab>Keen to take to the seas once more, Sisipu expresses her desire to have a new fishing boat built. She bids you consult with Forgemaster H'naanza of the Armorers' Guild in her stead regarding how long the commission might take.

TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_SEQ_02<tab>H'naanza regretfully informs you that Naldiq & Vymelli's is presently occupied with a large commission. Nonetheless, the forgemaster promises to do what she can in honor of the long-standing relationship between their two guilds.
TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_TODO_00<tab>Speak with H'naanza at the Armorers' Guild.

TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_SISIPU_000_0<tab>The Calamity really knocked the wind out the fishing industry's sails, but fisherfolk are starting to return to the seas once more. It's past time I did the same.

TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_SISIPU_000_1<tab>But before I can put out to sea again, I need to have a new boat built. Our guild has always commissioned Naldiq & Vymelli's for its crafts, but they are beastly busy these days.

TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_SISIPU_000_2<tab>If you want for something to do, mayhap you could run over to the Armorers' Guild and consult with Forgemaster H'naanza in my stead. I would know how long we might expect to have to wait.
TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_HNAANZA_000_10<tab>A new boat for the Fishermen's Guild? I'm afraid now isn't the best time...
TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_HNAANZA_000_11<tab>You see, we have recently taken on a commission for a galleon. This task alone has all our hands full.

TEXT_SUBSEA011_00121_HNAANZA_000_12<tab>But look, I will see what I can do. The Fishermen's Guild has long been one of our best clients, and I would be loath to disappoint Sisipu. It may yet take a while, but I shall endeavor to have her boat ready in a timely fashion.
